description:
Нашему клиенту, крупнейшему мировому производителю алкогольных напитков класса премиум, требуется Regulatory Affairs Manager.
 

Responsibilities:

  • To monitor regulatory environment via all possible sources for timely capturing trends, risks and opportunities;
  • To assess  both effective laws and draft legislations for identification of risks and opportunities;
  • To draft conclusions to regulatory acts and all kinds of official letters for further lobbying of business interests;
  • To report in duly and timely manner.

Requirements:
  • Knowledge of local and international legislation affecting business;
  • Experience gained from regulatory affairs preferably in food industry;
  • University degree preferably in quality management,   technology management or legal
  • Fluent English
 
Conditions:
  • Full time position;
  • Competitive salary;
  • Medical insurance;
  • Possibilities for professional growth
name: Regulatory Affairs Manager
